summary: This MOD adds the companion Jessica to your Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+1][b]Latest News[/b][/size]
- geegee has made an another Jessica MOD based on this. Check it out! ;D [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40545]  Lovely Jessica Redux[/url]
- My friend Foaman has released a new companion MOD. I created her face. Check it out! ;D [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29633]Olivia Wilde - Standalone Follower[/url]
- I added the playable presets of hair as new MOD. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28936]Vanilla Hair Variety Plus[/url]
- I added the replacer of Jordis Housecarl-Solitude as optional file. Check it out!
[color=#ff5555]   ? This had wrong links of textures. Please re-DL if you DL ver1.0(CBBE).  Sorry! x( [/color]
- [color=#ffaa55]I added a basic tutorial of face mesh customization.If you interested, try it! :)[/color]
- Gambit77 has made a bunch of Apachii Hair patches for this MOD. Check it out!  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28616/]Lovely Jessica Patches[/url]
- ErikRedbeard has made an impressive modified version. check it out!   [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28371]Jessica - Black Mystic[/url][color=#ee2222] (adult-only content)[/color]
[line]
DeadStatix has made an amazing video. Thanks! ;)
[youtube]8EccGQkzZCg[/youtube]
[line]
[size=+1][b]Announcement[/b][/size]
@Guys who requesting somebody or suggesting something. 

Requests from you guys have been properly recorded in the notes. :D
And I promise choosing next model from it. ;)
Jessica was actually the case.
[color=#88bbff][b]But I\'m not going to answer each of those posts or PMs, sorry. x([/b][/color]

I can\'t continue working of MOD without affection to the models.
Therefore, the possibility of realization is totally depend on my favoritism. xD
Modding is pastime to me totally.
So I can\'t enjoying things that I don\'t want to.

Thank you for your understanding, please. :)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I would like to say in advance, I have no skill for making a playable preset. I\'m sorry. x(
[line]
[size=+1][b]Description [/b][/size]
This MOD adds the companion Jessica to your Skyrim.
[color=#aaffaa]You can meet her at The Winking Skeever of Solitude.[/color]
She is Breton. She likes Light armor, Dual wield. And she is not Immortal. 
You can get married with her. ;D

Her hair is my original custom based on Vanilla ones.
I made this just only for her. So, It\'s an unique.
All Meshes and Textures are standalone. So she will probably looks the same as the SS.

She is wearing underwear, so she will not be naked also take off the armours.
If you want to see her underwear-style, you need use any follower MOD
I recommend fLokii\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url].

[color=#ffaabb]There are no plans to release nudity version or patch. So...
Please don\'t request it to me. [/color]
[line]
[size=+1][b]Required [/b][/size]
This MOD is not depend on any other MODs.
[size=+1][b]Notes[/b][/size]
- [color=#eeee22]Don\'t changes her weight.[/color] If you did, gap occurs in the neck.
  (Because I directly modified HeadMesh.)
- About load order. [color=#eeee22]Please set later (below) than the follower MOD.[/color]
[color=#88bbff][b]About the Jordis replacer [/b][/color]----------------------------------------
As long as not starting on New Game, she will be has neck gap. 
If you want to fix gap on Jordis\'s neck, please try to do these;
1 - Get the \"GapFixJordis\" from DL page, then extract it and copy \"GapFixJordis.txt\" to Data folder.
2 - Start Skyrim and meet her.
3 - [color=#eeee22]Please keep all the contents of her inventory.[/color] Because she will be reset later.
4 - Open the console, and click on her.
5 - Then type a \"bat gapfixjordis\", and push Enter key.
6 - Close the console. Now She will fixed.
-----------------------------------------------------
[size=+1][b]Install[/b][/size]
I recommend NMM-install/unistall.
If manually:
- extract RAR file [Jessica***.rar]
- Overwrites the [JessicaAlba***\\Data] to [Skyrim\\Data]. 
- Click on the \'Data Files\' of Skyrim Launcher and enable [JessicaAlba.esp].
[size=+1][b]Uninstall[/b][/size]
[color=#eeee22]Before uninstall, you should remove her from your followers in game.[/color]
If manually:
- Disable ESP with Skyrim Launcher.
- Delete the folders and files below.
Data\\JessicaAlba.esp
Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\JessicaAlba.esp\\000000D62.NIF
Data\\Meshes\\actors\\JessicaAlba
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\JessicaAlba.esp\\0000D62.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\JessicaAlba
[size=+1][b]Credits[/b][/size]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url].
Thanks to Caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]. 

[size=+1][b]About permission[/b][/size]
[color=#aaffaa]Please feel free to use data(except the body-mesh and body-texture) that is included in my MOD.
My permission is not necessary. No matter who.[/color]
[line]

[line]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28936]Vanilla Hair Variety Plus[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26112]AngeLydia -Lydia is reborn-[/url]
[line]
[size=+1]I hope your Skyrim-life will be more fun! ;D[/size]
author: Omega99jp
